forum.content:
Hi~I'm Alex, looking for friends chatting everyday life or stupid things XD. Just for fun so no serious grammar or spelling lessons:) If u are highly tolerated about imperfect English and willing to practice then please say hi to me:)
btw, I don't like sexual topics, so if u looking for that kind of chatting or fuck buddy, please scroll pass and thank u.
forum.title: Looking for friends chatting English
